Name: Apicurio
Text: Alright, this next is is called . . . Symmantis? Should be around here somewhere . . .

Name: Someone
Text: 'Sirrah! Deliver deified desserts detartrated!' stressed deified, reviled Harris.

Name: Someone
Text: Now saw ye no mosses or foam, or aroma of roses. So money was won.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Cool. Great. Well, you're the only weirdo around here, so you must be Symmantis.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Sure you are. Okay, whatever strange stuff you've been up to around here, cut it out. You're messing with the magical weave!

Name: Symmantis
Text: Ere hypocrisies or poses are in, my hymn I erase. So prose I, sir, copy here.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Listen bud, I'm not interested in attempting to decipher whatever it is you're saying.

Name: Symmantis
Text: Max, I stay away at six A.M.

Name: Apicurio
Text: Wonderful. Looks like you're gonna fight me on this, so shall we just skip to that part, then?

Name: Symmantis
Text: Egad, a base tone denotes a bad age.
